Skyeng-grammar-filter documentation¶

Passive voice detection¶

Passive Voice Search.

Passive voice search algorithm in the text. - Prepare raw text. - Use the NLP model. - Use rule-based algorithm. - Return results.

passive_voice.get_tense_rule(tense)¶

Function to take the rules for a certain tense.

passive_voice.passive_voice_search_batches(text, tense='ALL')¶

Search for passive voices for a given tense.

Using batches is much more efficient than raw text..

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text for analysis.

  • tense (str) – Given tense for search.

Returns

result – List contains: 1. Passive verbs. 2. Indexes of found phrases. 3. Initial forms of words. 4. Sentences that contain phrases.

Return type

list

Part of speech tagging¶

Search for a specific part of speech in the text.

POS search algorithm in the text. - Prepare raw text. - Use the NLP model. - Matching - Return results.

pos_tagging.pos_tag_search(text, pos_tag)¶

Search for a specific part of speech.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text for analysis.

  • pos_tag (str) – The desired part of speech.

Returns

result – List of tokens and their indices.

Return type

list

Process texts¶

Text processing before use.

We make some manipulations before submitting text to the input of the NLP model. - Replace some non-standard symbols. - Change standard tokenizer. - Change standard matcher.

text_processor.custom_matcher(nlp)¶

Change matcher of the NLP Model.

Parameters

nlp – Loaded NLP Model.

Returns

NLP Model with custom matcher.

Return type

Tokenizer(nlp)

text_processor.custom_tokenizer(nlp)¶

Change tokenizer of the NLP Model.

Parameters

nlp – Loaded NLP Model.

Returns

NLP Model with custom tokenizer.

Return type

Tokenizer(nlp)

text_processor.flexible_batch_indices(text, approximate_batch_size)¶

Find the borders of the batches.

Using batches is much more efficient than raw text..

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text for analysis.

  • approximate_batch_size (int) – Estimated batches size in characters.

Returns

batch_indices – List of indices of the end of batches.

Return type

list

text_processor.lexical_processor(text)¶

Gets raw text and returns processed.

Parameters

text (str) – Text for analysis.

Returns

text – Processed text for the NLP Model.

Return type

str

Complete tests for CPU and GPU¶

Script for complete testing the speed of applying the Natural Language Processing (NLP) model to the texts of various length

full_tests.export_csv(result, param, continue_df)¶

Export results to csv

Parameters

  • result (list) – List of results parameters

  • param (str) – Num of iterations

  • continue_df (bool) – Signs of continuous experiment. Getting N times to illustrate mean expectance perfomance with deviation

Returns

path – Path of saved csv table

Return type

str

full_tests.gather_csv(path)¶

Gather csv files by certain length of text

Parameters

path_to_csv (str) – The path to the csv file

Returns

Return type

Nested list of csv file paths

full_tests.merge_csv(path)¶

Merge csv files by certain length of text

Parameters

path_to_csv (str) – The path to the csv file

Returns

Return type

List of merged csv file paths

full_tests.plot_results(path_to_csv, save_path='', res_type='len', computation_type='cpu', plt_show=False, verbose=True)¶

Plot results by provided path of csv file and type of result to plot

Parameters

  • path_to_csv (str) – The path to the csv file

  • save_path (str) – The path to save the plot.

  • res_type (str) – ‘len’ or ‘num’ - Build plot by length or number of batches.

  • computation_type (str) – ‘cpu’, ‘gpu’ - The type was used.

  • plt_show (bool) – True for showing on IDE, False for better look in jupyter notebook.

  • verbose (bool) – Detailed description.

Returns

Return type

Saved plot image

full_tests.test_batch(path, num_of_times=3, min_batch_size=500, max_batch_size=5000, step=100, gpu=False)¶

Test text splitted by batches for given number of times :param path: Path of given text. :type path: str :param num_of_times: Number of times to measure each text. :type num_of_times: int :param min_batch_size: Minimum size of batches. :type min_batch_size: int :param max_batch_size: Maximum size of batches. :type max_batch_size: int :param step: Step to increase the size of the batch. :type step: int :param gpu: Flag to enable calculations on GPU. :type gpu: bool

Returns

Return type

Saves csv and png file with results

full_tests.test_full_text(path)¶

Test full text by it’s given path

Parameters

path (str) – Path to the text

Returns

Execution time in seconds

Return type

elapsed_time

full_tests.time_measurement(text, nlp, min_batch_size=500, max_batch_size=5000, step=100, verbose=False)¶

Measures time of given text and params for it’s evaluation

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text for analysis.

  • nlp – Loaded NLP Model.

  • min_batch_size (int) – Minimum batch size.

  • max_batch_size (int) – Maximum batch size.

  • step (int) – Step to iterate over size.

  • verbose (bool) – Detailed description

Returns

List contains: 1. Runtime list 2. Batches size list. 3. Number of batches list.

Return type

list
